org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.mapReduceLayer

Interface PigReducerEstimator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InputSizeReducerEstimator

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface PigReducerEstimator
    Interface to implement when you want to use a custom approach to estimating the number of reducers for a job.
    See Also:
    InputSizeReducerEstimator

    • Method Detail

      • estimateNumberOfReducers

        int estimateNumberOfReducers(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job,
                           MapReduceOper mapReduceOper)
                             throws IOException
        Estimate the number of reducers for a given job based on the collection of load funcs passed.
        Parameters:
        job - job instance
        mapReduceOper - map reducer operator of the job
        Returns:
        the number of reducers to use, or -1 if the count couldn't be estimated
        Throws:
        IOException
